quotes.quote: Up here my eyes are green leaves, unseeing.
Her eyes were olive green―incisive and clear.
The green-eyed angel came in less than a half hour and fell docile as a lamb into my arms.
O, beware, my lord, of jealousy; It is the green-ey'd monster, which doth mock The meat it feeds on.
I saw something in his pretty green eyes that I had never seen before: Anger. They were like emerald fire
The magician was studying her face with his green eyes. Your face is wet," he said worriedly.
Try to overcome your doubt. Believe you are beautiful. Look at yourself through someone else's green eyes.
Your green eye is a reducing chamber. If I look into it long enough, I wil become as small as my own reflection, I will diminish to a point and vanish.
He pleaded with those sea-green eyes, like a cute baby seal that needed help.
She smiled at him, though her hazel-green eyes were wary beneath the brim of a sodden hat.
Look...at...me..." he whispered. The green eyes found the black, but after a second, something in the depths of the dark pair seemed to vanish, leaving them fixed, blank, and empty.
When you're 25 or 30, you know, you can't wear lime-green eye shadow anymore.	When you're 25 or 30, you know, you can't wear lime-green eye shadow anymore.
Emerald green eyes studied us from a face that could have been sculpted by one of the classical artists I so admired.
The grief in her green eyes slips then hardens.
Jealousy's eyes are green.
And jestingly he told him then that nothing else would do but the green eye of the little yellow god.
I feel so lucky when I look in those green eyes.
Your green eyes just hypnotize me And I just love your flashy ways don't know my love is here.
Hey there green eyes sunshine and apple pie how you're so shy?
And you're green eyes turn to blue and you're always always fishing for the truth.
Your green eyes with their soft lights, your eyes that promise sweet nights bring to my soul a longing a thirst for love.
Green eyes are better than blue I ain't trying to be mean.
That green eyes yeah the spotlight shines upon you.
No green eyes no blue nights no jealous heart and no little white lies.
Feelings I can't disguise my heart beats fast when I see your green eyes.
Well would be a shame eyes of blue and eyes of green green green eyes are haunting.
Green eyes I'd run away with you green eyes cause I'm a fool I try running away.
Come in disguise green eyes under a red brimmed hat steal into class and sit beside me.
Giving me all of that green eye never let me out of your sight cause i'll give more than you plan.
When the tea is brought at five o'clock And all the neat curtains are drawn with care, The little black cat with bright green eyes Is suddenly purring there.
The green eyes in the carefully sweet face were turbulent, willful, lusty with life, distinctly at variance with her decorous demeanor. Her manners had been imposed upon her. her eyes were her own.
And his eyes were so green they could turn carbon dioxide into oxygen.
But for your eyes. Green as spring grass, and sparkling like dew in the morning sun.

Her green eyes came unafraid to his. The connection was so intense that it threatened to drain his sense of self. He felt that he had always known her, that she had always been a part of him, that her needs were his needs.
Those green eyes mocked her, and the ass leaned into her blade as if daring her to slice him.
Now her eyes meet mine like green lightning-they are green, these eyes of hers, whose power is so indescribable-green, but as are precious stones, or deep unfathomable mountain lakes.
